§d§oPunish the whisperer -- until they speak tears. 
§r§7Pressing (

§7) will consume §1Resentment§7, then obscure yourself for a short time. Getting hit while being obscure will stun the attacker and unleash a shadow strike. Restore §1Resentment§7 upon countering foes.
